places_to_visit.name: Outer Reef
places_to_visit.description: The Outer Reef is part of the Great Barrier Reef and offers some of the best snorkeling and diving experiences. It features vibrant coral reefs and diverse marine life.

places_to_visit.name: Whitsunday Islands
places_to_visit.description: The Whitsunday Islands are a group of beautiful islands in the heart of the Great Barrier Reef. They offer stunning beaches, clear waters, and a range of water-based activities.

places_to_visit.name: Hamilton Island
places_to_visit.description: Hamilton Island is a popular island resort with beautiful beaches, a marina, and a range of activities including water sports and island tours.

places_to_visit.name: Reef HQ Aquarium
places_to_visit.description: Reef HQ Aquarium in Townsville provides an opportunity to learn about the marine life of the Great Barrier Reef through interactive exhibits and educational displays.

places_to_visit.name: Green Island
places_to_visit.description: Green Island is a coral cay in the Great Barrier Reef offering snorkeling, diving, and glass-bottom boat tours. It's known for its lush rainforest and white sandy beaches.

activities: Snorkel or dive in the Outer Reef
Explore the Whitsunday Islands
Relax on Hamilton Island
Visit Reef HQ Aquarium in Townsville
Snorkel or take a glass-bottom boat tour on Green Island
tips_and_tricks: Bring reef-safe sunscreen to protect the marine environment.
Book snorkeling or diving tours in advance.
Check weather conditions and sea conditions before traveling.
